name: Doom 2 Wad: Blood Summons
description:
This map got it all! Big battles, eye-candy environments, slimy secrets and mind-melting mazes. Estimated 40 minutes of pure Doom action

Requires a Doom port (GZDoom, ZDoom) and a Doom2 wad

Secret Tips!

1. In an alley, activate a button from a distance
2. Explore the cave beyond the tree
3. Check behind a computer
4. A secret brick wall across from a powerful gun
5. A metallic wall that has a nice view
6. The final key opens the fire door
